    ‚Ä¢ Quarter 1 (Morning) - Morning routine, Deep work session, etc.
    ‚Ä¢ Quarter 2 (Midday) - Healthy lunch, Power nap, Exercise, etc.
    ‚Ä¢ Quarter 3 (Afternoon) - Meetings, Admin tasks, etc.
    ‚Ä¢ Quarter 4 (Evening) - Quality time with family & friends, Self-care, etc.
